com.googlecode.sarasvati

Interface JoinStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndJoinStrategy, ClassJoinStrategy, JoinLangJoinStrategy, LabelJoinStrategy, MergeJoinStrategy, OrJoinStrategy, TokenSetJoinStrategy, TokenSetOrJoinStrategy

    public interface JoinStrategy
    Encapsulates a strategy for determining if a node is ready to execute. A JoinStrategy will be executed whenever an ArcToken is processed. The join strategy will determine if a NodeToken will be created or if the ArcToken will be added to the list of active arc tokens.
    Author:
    Paul Lorenz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JoinResult performJoin(Engine engine, ArcToken token)
      Called on every ArcToken when processed.

    • Method Detail

      • performJoin

        JoinResult performJoin(Engine engine,
                     ArcToken token)
        Called on every ArcToken when processed.
        Parameters:
        engine - The engine executing the given process.
        token - The arc token being processed.
        Returns:
        A JoinResult which contains a boolean indicating whether or not the join is complete and the set of arc tokens participating in the join.
